          <title>
            <string language="es">Formación del suelo. Horizontes del suelo</string>
            <string language="en">Soil formation. Soil horizons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bodenanordnung. Bodenhorizonte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation de sol. Horizons de sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação do solo. Horizontes do solo</string>

terreno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδαφολογικός σχηματισμός. Εδαφολογικοί ορίζοντες</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Se explican los factores de los que depende la formación del suelo y los horizontes del perfil de un suelo.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic explaining the factors which cause soil formation and soil horizons.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geología</string>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">suelo</string>

          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, das die Faktoren erklärt, die 
Bodenanordnung und Bodenhorizonte verursachen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet expliquant les facteurs qui causent la 
formation de sol et les horizons de sol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que explica os fatores que causam a 
formação do solo e os horizontes do solo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che spiega i fattori che causano la 
formazione del terreno e gli orizzonti del terreno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξηγεί τους παράγοντες που προκαλούν τον 
εδαφολογικό σχηματισμό και τους εδαφολογικούς ορίζοντες.</string>
          </description>
